sections.heading: Short title. This Act may be cited as the Increasing Representation of Women in Technology Task Force Act.
sections.text: Short title. This Act may be cited as the Increasing Representation of Women in Technology Task Force Act.

sections.heading: Increasing Representation of Women in Technology Task Force; membership.

sections.heading: Duties. The Task Force shall have the following duties:
sections.text: Duties. The Task Force shall have the following duties:

sections.heading: Report. The Task Force shall report to the Governor and the General Assembly by December 1 of each year on its activities and findings
sections.text: The Task Force shall submit a final report to the Governor and the General Assembly by December 1, 2028 on all of its activities and final findings and recommendati

sections.heading: Repeal. This Act is repealed on January 1, 2030.
sections.text: Repeal. This Act is repealed on January 1, 2030.

sections.heading: Effective date. This Act takes effect January 1, 2025.
sections.text: Effective date. This Act takes effect January 1, 2025.
